sn46.50:1.1: “Bahiram, bhikkhave, anganti karitva nannam ekangampi samanupassami sattannam bojjhanganam uppadaya, yathayidam—bhikkhave, kalyanamittata.
sn46.50:1.2: Kalyanamittassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno patikankham—satta bojjhange bhavessati, satta bojjhange bahulikarissati.
sn46.50:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti?
sn46.50:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam …pe…
sn46.50:1.5: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.50:1.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanamitto satta bojjhange bhaveti, satta bojjhange bahulikaroti”ti.
